changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_ban') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_ban GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.remove_ban @ban_mode TINYINT, @account_id dbo.id_t, @character_id dbo.id_t, @ip_address VARCHAR(30) AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
IF @ban_mode = 1 BEGIN DELETE FROM dbo.Bans WHERE account_id = @account_id END ELSE IF @ban_mode = 2 BEGIN DELETE FROM dbo.Bans WHERE character_id = @character_id END ELSE IF @ban_mode = 3 BEGIN DELETE FROM dbo.Bans WHERE ip_address = @ip_address END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
